message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm a bit on a tight budget, and I'd love to get a better deal on this.

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $90 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but how about $105?  This would still allow me to make a reasonable profit and gives you a good deal on a valuable product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $105 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $100. That way, we can both come out happy.
